goal.en: This course is a compulsory basic course for introductory physics, and establishes basic physical images and theoretical framework for electromagnetism. Through teaching, students will be trained in self- learning, systematic thinking and dialectics, and manipulation of English and mathematical tools.
goal.ch: 本課程為物理入門必修基礎課程，針對電磁學建立基礎物理圖像與理論架構。 將透過教學對學生進行自我與自主學習、系統思維與辯證、英文與數學工具操控等方法學鍛鍊。

content.en:
1. Vector Calculus
2. Electrostatics
3. Magnetostatics
4. Maxwell equations
5. Potential formalism; Conservation laws
6. Electromagnetic Wave
7. Special relativity
content.ch:

textbook.en: 1. David Griffiths, “Introduction to Electrodynamics“; 2. Benson, “University Physics“, or any equivalent 1st-year general physics textbook
textbook.ch: 1. David Griffiths, “Introduction to Electrodynamics“; 2. Benson, “University Physics“, or any equivalent 1st-year general physics textbook

flex_desc.en: We will try to use a condensed schedule and look to finish all our lecture materials and exams with 16 weeks.  If there happens to be a delay, we will shift the oral exam dates to sometime in the 17th and 18th weeks, if needed.
flex_desc.ch: 我們會試圖將18周的課程內容精簡在16周的時程內講授及測驗完畢. 如果有不可抗力之因素導致授課進度延誤, 將會視情況將期末口試調整在17及18周
